summary:
The Bow is Black with Gold leaf Etchings.
Quiver matches the Steel Design but is Black.
Arrows show Nice Gold Flights.
descriptionHtml:
This Originaly came from kokorozukais Legolas Mod.
I just seperated The bow and quiver from his Original Mod.

It replaces the ebony bow, Arrows and Quiver.

The Bow is Black with Gold leaf Etchings.
Quiver matches the Steel Design but is Black.
Arrows show Nice Gold Flights.

Thanks kokorozukai :)


CAN SOMEONE PLEASE MOD THAT HAT SHE\'S WEARING TO ALL BLACK, I CANT FIND ONE ANYWHERE..THANKS :)

Legolas Textures - Armor plus Bow and Arrows by kokorozukai
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1453
author: kokorozukai
